snippet: Lush, the beauty company based in Dorset, England, which has a strong following for its handmade skincare, is introducing a line of handmade makeup this month in its 800 stores around the world and through its Web site.
abstract: Lush, the beauty company based in Dorset, England, which has a strong following for its handmade skincare, is introducing a line of handmade makeup this month in its 800 stores around the world and through its Web site.

headline.main: From Their Hands to Your Lips (and Eyes)
